name: Flowers and Washing Machines
description:
This is a prototype* for a game about anxiety. 

In Flowers and Washing Machines you talk to three flowers representing different topics you are anxious about. The room will fill up with water the more anxious thoughts you have, but go down the more positive thoughts you have.  The game has a unique dialogue system where the three flowers all follow along in the conversation, allowing you to get different perspectives on your dialogue choices.

*This is prototype meaning that the game doesn't currently have an end point and there will likely be plenty of bugs but nevertheless I hope you enjoy the concept!
